title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for y = C e k t or 1 point for each: ln | y | = k t + C , y = e k t + C

1 point is earned for C = 10 6

1 point is earned for k = − ln 2 6

1 point is earned for answer

*Max 2/5 If y is not an exponential

d y d t = k y y = C e k t           o r     { d y y = k d t ln | y | = k t + C 1 y = e k t + C 1       t = 0 ⇒ C ⇒ 10 6 ,   C 1 = ln 10 6 ∴ y = 10 6 e k t t = 6 ⇒ 1 2 = e 6 k ∴ k = − ln 2 6 y = 10 6 e − t 6 ln 2 = 10 6 ⋅ 2 − t 6
descriptions:

2 points are earned for y = C e k t or 1 point for each: ln | y | = k t + C , y = e k t + C

1 point is earned for C = 10 6
